datasheets.name: Armiger Helverin
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 Armiger autocannons; Questoris heavy stubber; armoured feet.
wargear: This model’s Questoris heavy stubber can be replaced with 1 meltagun.

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Skyfire Protocols
other.description: While this model is either wholly within your deployment zone or within range of an objective marker you control, its Armiger autocannons have the [ANTI-FLY 2+] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Armiger Warglaive
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Questoris heavy stubber; thermal spear; reaper chain-cleaver.
wargear: This model’s Questoris heavy stubber can be replaced with 1 meltagun.

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Impetuous Glory
other.description: Each time this model makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, melee weapons equipped by this model have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Canis Rex
datasheets.loadout: Canis Rex is equipped with: Chainbreaker las-impulsor; Chainbreaker multi-laser; Freedom’s Hand.
wargear: None

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Legendary Freeblade
other.description: Once per turn, you can target this model with a Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem in the same phase.

other.name: Chainbreaker
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack, an unmodifed successful Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

special.name: Sir Hekhtur
special.description: If Canis Rex is destroyed, flip this card and follow the instructions for using Sir Hekhtur.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Knight Castellan
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: plasma decimator; 2 shieldbreaker missile launchers; 2 twin meltaguns; twin siegebreaker cannon, volcano lance; titanic feet.
wargear: This model’s 2 shieldbreaker missile launchers and twin siegebreaker cannon can be replaced with: ◦  1 shieldbreaker missile launcher and 2 twin siegebreaker cannons

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Ion Aegis (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly Armiger model is within 6" of this model, that Armiger models has the Benefits of Cover.

other.name: Titan Hunter
other.description: Each time a ranged attack made by this model is allocated to a Monster or Vehicle model, re-roll a Damage roll of 1.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Knight Crusader
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: avenger gatling cannon; heavy flamer; meltagun; thermal cannon; titanic feet.
wargear: This model’s meltagun can be replaced with 1 Questoris heavy stubber.
This model’s thermal cannon can be replaced with: ◦  1 rapid-fire battlecannon and 1 Questoris heavy stubber
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 Icarus autocannons ◦ 1 ironstorm missile pod ◦ 1 stormspear rocket pod

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Crusader’s Duty (Bondsman)
other.description: While a model is affected by this ability, each time that model makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

other.name: Punishing Salvoes
other.description: In your Movement phase, if this model Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, this model’s ranged weapons have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Knight Errant
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: meltagun; thermal cannon; reaper chainsword.
wargear: This model’s meltagun can be replaced with 1 Questoris heavy stubber.
This model’s reaper chainsword can be replaced with 1 thunderstrike gauntlet.
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 Icarus autocannons ◦ 1 ironstorm missile pod ◦ 1 stormspear rocket pod

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Errant’s Duty (Bondsman)
other.description: While a model is affected by this ability, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for that model and its ranged weapons have the [ASSAULT] ability.

other.name: Aggressive Assault
other.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack against the closest eligible target, add 1 to the Hit roll.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Knight Gallant
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: meltagun; thunderstrike gauntlet; reaper chainsword.
wargear: This model’s meltagun can be replaced with 1 Questoris heavy stubber.
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 Icarus autocannons ◦ 1 ironstorm missile pod ◦ 1 stormspear rocket pod

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Gallant’s Duty (Bondsman)
other.description: While a model is affected by this ability, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for that model and each time that model makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

other.name: Martial Pride
other.description: Each time a melee attack targets this model, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Knight Paladin
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: meltagun; Questoris heavy stubber; rapid-fire battlecannon; reaper chainsword.
wargear: This model’s meltagun can be replaced with 1 Questoris heavy stubber.
This model’s reaper chainsword can be replaced with 1 thunderstrike gauntlet.
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 Icarus autocannons ◦ 1 ironstorm missile pod ◦ 1 stormspear rocket pod

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Paladin’s Duty (Bondsman)
other.description: While a model is affected by this ability, its weapons have the [LETHAL HITS] and [LANCE] abilities.

other.name: Seasoned Noble
other.description: Once per phase, you can re-roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll or one saving throw made for this model.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Knight Preceptor
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: las-impulsor; Preceptor multi-laser; reaper chainsword.
wargear: This model’s Preceptor multi-laser can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 meltagun ◦ 1 Questoris heavy stubber
This model’s reaper chainsword can be replaced with 1 thunderstrike gauntlet.
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 Icarus autocannons ◦ 1 ironstorm missile pod ◦ 1 stormspear rocket pod

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Mentor (Bondsman)
other.description: While a model is affected by this ability, improve that model’s Leadership characteristic by 1 and improve that model’s Objective Control characteristic by 2.

other.name: Exemplar of the Code
other.description: At the start of the battle, select one unit from your opponent’s army. Each time this model makes an attack that targets that unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Knight Valiant
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: conflagration cannon; 2 shieldbreaker missile launchers; thundercoil harpoon; 2 twin meltaguns; twin siegebreaker cannon, titanic feet.
wargear: This model’s 2 shieldbreaker missile launchers and twin siegebreaker cannon can be replaced with: ◦  1 shieldbreaker missile launcher and 2 twin siegebreaker cannons

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Ion Aegis (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly Armiger model is within 6" of this model, that Armiger model has the Benefit of Cover.

other.name: Overwhelming Firestorm
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by this model this phase. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Knight Warden
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: avenger gatling cannon; heavy flamer; meltagun; reaper chainsword.
wargear: This model’s meltagun can be replaced with 1 Questoris heavy stubber.
This model’s reaper chainsword can be replaced with 1 thunderstrike gauntlet.
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 Icarus autocannons ◦ 1 ironstorm missile pod ◦ 1 stormspear rocket pod

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Warden’s Duty (Bondsman)
other.description: While a model is affected by this ability, each time an attack is allocated to that model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

other.name: Thin Their Ranks
other.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles), that attack has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Sir Hekhtur
datasheets.loadout: Sir Hekhtur is equipped with: Hekhtur’s pistol; close combat weapon.

special.name: USING SIR HEKHTUR
special.description: When your Canis Rex model is destroyed, Sir Hekhtur is treated as a model disembarking from a destroyed Transport – set him up within 3" of your Canis Rex model before it is removed. Sir Hekhtur then uses the profile, wargear, abilities and keywords shown on this side of the card, but cannot be  selected as the target of any of your Stratagems other than Core Stratagems. Your Canis Rex unit is not considered to be destroyed until Sir Hekhtur is also destroyed.
